indications: Losartan potassium and hydrochlorothiazide tablets are a combination of losartan, an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) and hydrochlorothiazide, a diuretic indicated for: • Treatment of hypertension, to lower blood pressure. Lowering blood pressure reduces the risk of fatal and nonfatal cardiovascular events, primarily strokes and myocardial infarctions. (1.1) • Reduction of the risk of stroke in patients with hypertension and left ventricular hypertrophy. There is evidence that this benefit does not apply to Black patients. (1.2)
contraindications: Hypertension • Usual starting dose: 50/12.5 mg once daily. (2.1) • Titrate as needed to a maximum dose of 100/25 mg. (2.1) Hypertensive Patients with Left Ventricular Hypertrophy • Not controlled on monotherapy: Initiate with 50/12.5 mg. Titrate as needed to a maximum of 100/25 mg. (2.2)
warningsAndPrecautions:
Losartan potassium and hydrochlorothiazide tablets, USP are supplied as a film-coated tablet.
                  
                  100/12.5 mg - white to off-white, oval, biconvex with "ML 42" imprint.
                  
                  
                     Storage
                  
                  
                  Store at 20° to 25° C (68° to 77° F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30° C (59° to 86° F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Keep container tightly closed. Protect from light.
                  
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:
  
Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.
  
Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions:
Losartan potassium and hydrochlorothiazide tablets are contraindicated:  
    • In patients who are hypersensitive to any component of this product.  
    • In patients with anuria  
    • For coadministration with aliskiren in patients with diabetes
name: Losartan potassium and Hydrochlorothiazide
